title: 245A.18 CHILD PASSENGER RESTRAINT SYSTEMS.
text:
All license holders that transport children must comply with the requirements of section 142B.51, subdivision 1, and license holders that transport a child or children under eight years of age must document training that fulfills the requirements in section 142B.51, subdivision 2.
MS 2023 Supp [Repealed, 2024 c 80 art 2 s 75]
